settings.enableAbilityQuickRoll.name: Enable Quick Roll for Abilities
settings.enableAbilityQuickRoll.hint: When clicking on an ability check or saving throw, automatically roll to chat instead of using the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.
settings.enableSkillQuickRoll.name: Enable Quick Roll for Skills
settings.enableSkillQuickRoll.hint: When clicking on a skill check, automatically roll to chat instead of using the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.
settings.enableItemQuickRoll.name: Enable Quick Roll for Items
settings.enableItemQuickRoll.hint: When clicking on an item, spell, or feature, automatically roll to chat instead of using the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.
settings.enableAltQuickRoll.name: Enable Alternate Quick Roll for Items
settings.enableAltQuickRoll.hint: When Alt-clicking on an item's image, output a different automatic roll which can be configured separately per item. Overwrites ability to bypass quick roll with default chat output.
settings.rollModifierMode.name: Roll Modifier Keys
settings.rollModifierMode.hint: Determines which keys to use to modify quick rolls to have advantage or disadvantage. This has no effect if quick rolls are disabled.

error.libWrapperMinVersion: Ready Set Roll requires libWrapper version {version} or newer.
